items.sentence: I want the whole world to know we\'re in love.
I know that most people here can speak French.
Tom tried to squeeze in between Mary and John.
Tom tried to talk Mary into driving all night.
Tom decided to learn to live with the problem.
I\'ll be there the first thing in the morning.
I\'ll do whatever I can to protect all of you.
I wish someone would tell me what\'s going on.
I wish we had the time to help, but we don\'t.
I won\'t allow my daughter to go out with you.
